trans-unit.source: The default Workflow Accelerator login screen

seg-source.mrk: The default Workflow Accelerator login screen

trans-unit.source: When the Workflow Accelerator system was started properly you can see the login screen by entering the URL of your Workflow Accelerator installation in your browser. There are different versions of the login screen. If you purchased an Workflow Accelerator standalone version, you will see a form that requires an email address and a password to login.

seg-source.mrk: When the Workflow Accelerator system was started properly you can see the login screen by entering the URL of your Workflow Accelerator installation in your browser.
There are different versions of the login screen.
If you purchased an Workflow Accelerator standalone version, you will see a form that requires an email address and a password to login.

target.mrk: Nachdem Workflow Accelerator erfolgreich gestartet wurde, können Sie nun die Login-Maske öffnen, indem Sie die Workflow Accelerator-URL Ihrer Installation im Browser aufrufen.
Die Login-Maske unterscheidet sich in den verschiedenen Workflow Accelerator-Versionen.
Die Login-Maske der Standalone-Version enthält Eingabemöglichkeiten für Nutzername und Passwort und sieht wie folgt aus:

trans-unit.source: The default Workflow Accelerator login screen

seg-source.mrk: The default Workflow Accelerator login screen

trans-unit.source: If you purchased Workflow Accelerator along with Signavio Process Manager, you will see a login screen with one button. You can login to Workflow Accelerator using your Signavio Process Manager account as soon as the Workflow Accelerator users have been set up. See section <MadCap:xref href="../process-manager-integration/user-management.htm#UserManagement" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">User management </MadCap:xref> for more information on how to set up the users.

seg-source.mrk: If you purchased Workflow Accelerator along with Signavio Process Manager, you will see a login screen with one button.
You can login to Workflow Accelerator using your Signavio Process Manager account as soon as the Workflow Accelerator users have been set up.

See section <MadCap:xref href="../process-manager-integration/user-management.htm#UserManagement" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">User management </MadCap:xref> for more information on how to set up the users.

target.mrk: Im Abschnitt <MadCap:xref href="../process-manager-integration/user-management.htm#UserManagement" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">User management </MadCap:xref> finden Sie detaillierte Anweisungen zur Nutzererstellung.

alt-trans.seg-source: If you purchased Workflow Accelerator along with Signavio Process Manager, you will see a login screen with one button. You can login to Workflow Accelerator using your Signavio Process Manager account as soon as the Workflow Accelerator users have been set up.
alt-trans.target: Falls Sie Workflow Accelerator in Kombination mit dem Signavio Process Manager erworben haben, befindet sich in der Login-Maske lediglich eine Schaltfläche, die den Login mit Ihrem Process Manager-Konto ermöglicht.

trans-unit.source: When you click Log in with Signavio account , you will be redirected to Signavio Process Manager and asked to authorize the access of Workflow Accelerator. When you click on Grant , you will be redirected back to Workflow Accelerator and automatically logged in. The authorization dialog is only shown the first time you use this method to login.

seg-source.mrk: When you click Log in with Signavio account , you will be redirected to Signavio Process Manager and asked to authorize the access of Workflow Accelerator.
When you click on Grant , you will be redirected back to Workflow Accelerator and automatically logged in. The authorization dialog is only shown the first time you use this method to login.

target.mrk: Ein Klick auf Mit meinem Signavio Konto anmelden leitet Sie zum Signavio Process Manager-System weiter, in dem Sie nun den Zugriff von Workflow Accelerator bestätigen müssen.
Hier bestätigen Sie nun den Zugriff mit Grant.

trans-unit.source: You have to be logged in to Signavio Process Manager in order to see the authorization dialog. Otherwise, you will be redirected to the Collaboration Portal.

seg-source.mrk: You have to be logged in to Signavio Process Manager in order to see the authorization dialog.
Otherwise, you will be redirected to the Collaboration Portal.

target.mrk: Damit dieser Dialog angezeigt wird, müssen Sie im Signavio Process Manager angemeldet sein.
Andernfalls werden Sie zum Signavio Collaboration Portal weitergeleitet.
